entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse After hiding in the bunker the photo op was more important than talking to the nation. How'd that work out for you #BunkerBoy It shows the world that president Skidmark is a coward and unfit to lead. 108,029 DEAD, looks like opening to soon didn't work out #coronavirus
